version_description:
You will be stunned after updating the app!

• Stickers are now available for iOS
Our traditional set of stickers have become available to all users regardless of the device from which you log into the Chat.

• The all-new Shop
We radically revised the concept of our shop. It has become easier and more intuitive. Even just to be in the shop become a pleasure.

• Camera improvements
Down with the curves of the neck. You can twist the phone into any of 4 sides! The app will automatically set up your broadcast in the correct projection.

• General performance improvements
A ton of surprises in the optimization. Now there are more users and broadcasts and in the Chat. Are you intrigued? Open FlirtyMania app immediately after the update!

Well we all have been working hard all the New Year holidays. Really. One of the programmers has been writing code straight during the battle of chimes. Don't believe us? Update the app to see everything with your own eyes.

A list of Surprises:
- Optimization. Lots of optimization. Even more than usually. By Jove!
- New Super Stickers. You can spank other users, prohibit them writing in the chat, recover energy and resurrect yourself.
- Interface improvements. New useful buttons and Spectators and Subscriptions lists in the sidebar have appeared. Enjoy!

While you are updating the app, we work hard on the next important improvements. See you soon with new surprises.

Talk to prospective dates in a private chat: this update will allow you to access your private message history. Chat and give our new gifts! They are equally great to receive and send.

Our designers and programmers also have good news for you. Our rooms and chats are now better looking and easier to use, giving you a more exciting experience finding a date. Video quality will be set automatically and thanks to improved previews, choosing a video chat to visit will be easier.

• A new system of Messages: communicate only with the people you want to talk to!
• Much easier broadcasting with improved navigation system;
• Real faces on all profile pictures thanks to face recognition!
• Get a closer look at your new friends with enlarged profile pictures!
• Indications for new personal messages in public chat and for new comments in your chat room;
• New cards and stickers!
• A faster working, optimised app.

We have a lot of good news today!

It is easier now to be on the front page — just take the right photo and everyone will see you even before the broadcast starts.
A reward system for hosts: collect likes and receive cards for free!
What's on filters — pick who you watch!

It has been an amazing year, thanks to all our users for spending it with us! Hurry up to install the final update for 2016!

• For everyone who prefers to stay anonymous, now there is the option to use the app without authorization. Once you decide to change a device and save your level and list of friends, just create an account.
• Now you can use your mobile number or email address to log in to the chat!

With each update, our application gets faster and easier to use — you are sure to notice it. In addition to design improvements and optimizations, this time the system for selling gifts has changed: now, any user can split them and get playing cards and coins!

Private conversations has never been easier! Our latest update includes the option “Invite on a Date” which is available to all users without exception rather than just our VIP Club members. To create a private chat, send out an invitation yourself or accept an invitation from another user.

Tired of too much attention? Limit the users who can invite you to VIP members and friends only.

Great new for presenters!
Make coins with any popular broadcast. The more viewers you attract, the more you earn per minute of live broadcast. Once your broadcast is upgraded to 'paid', your account will be credited automatically.

Hit our Hall Of Fame! With this update our users can receive free coins every week. To hit one of those charts you just have to earn or spend more coins than the other users. We have also fixed some bugs and improved the sound quality!
Download the latest update to use all of the new video chat features!

Welcome to a hot summer update!

Hot broadcasts: Your likes matter much more to a broadcaster now. As the show had collected enough of them the broadcast received a “hot” badge and the showgirl will get double coins. Our broadcasts are getting more exciting now!

Private broadcasts: Really like a girl from the show? Kick everybody out the chat room and get to stay with her face to face!

Black list and ignore: You asked for this and we've done it!

We’re sure you’ll love that update!

• Just added long anticipated HD broadcast quality;
• Navigation became much easier and more handy;
• Now you can use two webcams during the private chat and see each other;
• Broadcasters earn coins for messages from viewers sent to their chat room.

In this update we’ve upgraded the authorization system significantly.

Don’t forget to protect your account with a strong password, and chat without a worry!

This time we have developed several improvements that will make the application more convenient for our excellent hosts:

- Increased anonymity - ban your broadcast from viewing in selected countries with the help of a blacklist;
- Increased convenience and speed of coin exchange;
- Improved moderation system - just follow the prompts on the screen. Viewers will see only the best broadcasts on the main screen!
- Optimization, bug fixes and a small redesign.

Fixed some bugs and optimized the work of the application, navigation has been simplified.
Watching broadcasts with interesting people is even more comfortable now!

Besides, we have been working on improving the quality of our video streams - this release will already give you better image quality!

New Flirtymania update is here!

1. Streaming experience reconsidered: achieve better quality and consistency when broadcasting or watching live video
2. Minor bugs fixed
3. UX improved.
Fixed some bugs

Install and find even more exciting broadcasts!
Flirtymania became faster and more convenient.
In this update we have fixed minor bugs and improved user interface.

- We updated broadcasts - they became themed! Everyone can find the perfect theme for themselves!
- We also fixed annoying bugs.

Don't miss the new update! What we've done:
- Added a Feed - watch users' photos and videos!
- Added a Catalog - look through profiles and find new friends!
- Fixed minor errors and bugs.

- Added a Catalog - look through profiles and find new friends!
- Fixed minor errors and bugs.

- Fixed minor errors and bugs
- Added iPhone X, XR, XS, XS Max support

- We also fixed annoying bugs.

We are ready with a huge May update!
The new version gives you:
- photos and videos posting
- fresh design
- updated feed
- improved navigation
- increased performance

June update! We improved the subscription system. Now, everything works well and clearly for you. We are waiting for your feedback.

Hot summer update!
● added dollars
● added money withdrawal
● improved translation
● fixed several bugs
Share stories, go live, receive gifts and earn real money!

Hot summer update!
● added dollars
● added money withdrawal
● improved translation
● fixed several bugs
Share stories, go live, receive gifts and earn real money!
In this update we fixed the chat - messages don't disappear anymore. We also fixed the feed so that you don't miss featured posts.

The big update! What we did: updated posts and chats interface; changed the subscription system - now there are 4 levels and each has its bonuses; tweaked the option of adding GIFs to a post. You asked for the last one a lot :)

Sneaked into the code and fixed the server connection error.
Polished the interface, so you can enjoy using the videoplayer more.

Sneaked into the code and fixed the server connection error.
Polished the interface, so you can enjoy using the videoplayer more.

On winter holidays, the interface was updated - it is nice and comfortable now.
We care about you, which is why some content is tagged as NSFW. Allow NSFW in Settings to view such content.

Spring has arrived! Meanwhile, we've fixed several bugs and made the interface work faster.
Little things make a big difference.

Added a VIP subscription. Watch any streams for free and without time limits!
Grab coins as a gift every day!
Subscription can be purchased from the coin purchase menu.
